name: METHODIST HOSPITAL v. John CAMPISI and Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire. Appeal of Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: METHODIST HOSPITAL v. John CAMPISI and Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire. Appeal of Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: P.A.T. Cardy, Philadelphia, for Daniel Del Collo, Jr.

casebody.head_matter:
739 A.2d 160
METHODIST HOSPITAL v. John CAMPISI and Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire. Appeal of Daniel Del Collo, Jr., Esquire.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1999.
Decided Nov. 8, 1999.
P.A.T. Cardy, Philadelphia, for Daniel Del Collo, Jr.
Howard R. Maniloff, Philadelphia, for Methodist Hosp.
Lauren Levin, Philadelphia, for John Campisi.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
